description:
When implementing objects, we should make sure that InstanceInfoCache handles hydrating the NetworkModel from the network_info json automatically.  Converting the InstanceInfoCache to primitive should also handle jsonifying this network model.

All uses of info_cache['network_info'] should be fixed to trust that the network_info is already in NetworkModel format.
title: Make InstanceInfoCache.network_info be the NetworkModel

comments.content:
When implementing objects, we should make sure that InstanceInfoCache handles hydrating the NetworkModel from the network_info json automatically.  Converting the InstanceInfoCache to primitive should also handle jsonifying this network model.

All uses of info_cache['network_info'] should be fixed to trust that the network_info is already in NetworkModel format.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens
